Texts.Chs: 我的家乡明令禁止AI。但为了我的研究，我需要一个^orange;智能芯片^reset;！你能带我一个吗？我很乐意给你报酬。
Texts.Eng: AI is expressly forbidden on my homeworld. But I need an ^orange;AI Chip^reset; for my research! Can you please bring me one? I would reward you nicely.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;智能芯片^reset;带给戴护目镜的星之子。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;AI Chip^reset; to the goggled Novakid at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 谢谢，这是我给你的奖励。
Texts.Eng: Thanks. I've transferred payment for your troubles directly to your account.
